mapper.insert: insert into assemblyman (assemblyman_id, assemblyman_name, image_url, org_image_url, mod_dttm, party_id, party_name, local_constituency, update_tag) values(#{assemblyman_id}, #{assemblyman_name}, #{image_url}, #{org_image_url}, #{mod_dttm}, #{party_id}, #{party_name}, #{local_constituency}, #{update_tag})
